attributes.action: Make it mandatory for ID to be linked to have a social media account of any form
attributes.additional_details: Mainly so we can have a somewhat push of getting rid of online trolls and people hiding behind fake accounts and abusing people because a lot of online hate you see is people that hide behind fake names or blank profile pictures, I believe this will counteract a lot of online hate and therefore if anyone does be hateful towards others you have the id of that person and the right protocols can be taken
attributes.background: Make it so that you have to prove yourself and have ID verified to have an account on the likes of Instagram, Twitter, Facebook etc

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition:

Make verified ID a requirement for opening a social media account.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/575833
